verses.verse: Then the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near;<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> <S%H4244>Mahlah,<s%> <S%H5270>Noah<s%> and <S%H2295>Hoglah<s%> and <S%H4435>Milcah<s%> and <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

And they <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Our father <S%H1>died<s%> in the <S%H4191>wilderness,<s%> yet he was not <S%H4057>among<s%> the <S%H8432>company<s%> of those who <S%H5712>gathered<s%> themselves together <S%H3259>against<s%> the <S%H5921>Lord<s%> in the <S%H3068>company<s%> of <S%H5712>Korah;<s%> but he <S%H7141>died<s%> in his own <S%H4191>sin,<s%> and he <S%H2399>had<s%> <S%H1961>no<s%> <S%H3808>sons.<s%>

<S%H4100>"Why<s%> should the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our father be <S%H1>withdrawn<s%> from <S%H1639>among<s%> his <S%H8432>family<s%> <S%H4940>because<s%> he <S%H3588>had<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>son<s%>? <S%H1121>Give<s%> us a <S%H5414>possession<s%> <S%H272>among<s%> our father's <S%H8432>brothers.<s%>"
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> their <S%H4941>case<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"The <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> are <S%H9210>right<s%> in [their] <S%H1696>statements.<s%> You shall <S%H5414>surely<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H5159>hereditary<s%> <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> their father's <S%H1>brothers,<s%> and you shall <S%H251>transfer<s%> the <S%H5674>inheritance<s%> of their father to them.

"Further, you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>'If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4191>dies<s%> and <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> then you shall <S%H5674>transfer<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to his <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>
'And <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> then you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>
'And <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H251>brothers,<s%> then you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to his father's <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

'And <S%H518>if<s%> his father <S%H1>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>brothers,<s%> then you shall <S%H251>give<s%> his <S%H5414>inheritance<s%> to his <S%H5159>nearest<s%> <S%H7138>relative<s%> in his own <S%H7607>family,<s%> and he shall <S%H4940>possess<s%> it; and it shall be a <S%H3423>statutory<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> to the <S%H4941>sons<s%> of <S%H1121>Israel,<s%> <S%H3478>just<s%> as the <S%H9201>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>commanded<s%> <S%H6680>Moses.<s%>' "

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5927>"Go<s%> up to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H5682>Abarim,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
"And when you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> it, you <S%H1571>too<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to your <S%H9415>people,<s%> as <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> was;

for in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin,<s%> during the <S%H4808>strife<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> you <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> My <S%H6310>command<s%> to <S%H6942>treat<s%> Me as <S%H6942>holy<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> at the water. <S%H1992>"(These<s%> are the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah<s%> of <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin.<s%>)
Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"May the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirits<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H6485>appoint<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%>

<S%H834>who<s%> will <S%H3318>go<s%> out and <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H834>who<s%> will <S%H3318>lead<s%> them out and <S%H935>bring<s%> them in, that the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> may not be like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%> "

So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> is the <S%H7307>Spirit,<s%> and <S%H5564>lay<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> on him;

and have him <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation;<s%> and <S%H6680>commission<s%> him in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of your <S%H1935>authority<s%> on him, in <S%H4616>order<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may <S%H8085>obey<s%> [him.]

"Moreover, he shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> who shall <S%H7592>inquire<s%> for him by the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H224>Urim<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> At his <S%H6310>command<s%> they shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out and at his <S%H6310>command<s%> they shall <S%H935>come<s%> in, [both] he and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him, even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>"

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him; and he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>
Then he <S%H5564>laid<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> on him and <S%H6680>commissioned<s%> him, <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
